mapper.select: SELECT * FROM formpage WHERE formcmName in (SELECT formId FROM myurlregist WHERE (pageId=#{pageId} OR parentId=#{pageId}) AND curStatus=2) AND formType = #{formType} AND (formType = 1 OR formType = 3) AND curStatus=2

SELECT count(*) FROM formpage
and formcmName like concat('%', #{formcmName}, '%') and formcmTitle like concat('%', #{formcmTitle}, '%') and formTask like concat('%', #{formTask}, '%') and listTask like concat('%', #{listTask}, '%') and recordName like concat('%', #{recordName}, '%') and modifyName like concat('%', #{modifyName}, '%') AND formType = #{formType} AND (formType = 1 OR formType = 3) AND curStatus=2
order by recordTime desc
SELECT count(*) FROM formpage WHERE formcmName in (SELECT formId FROM myurlregist WHERE (pageId=#{pageId} OR parentId=#{pageId}) AND curStatus=2) AND formType = 1 AND curStatus=2

SELECT * FROM formpage
and formcmName =#{formcmName} and curStatus=2
order by recordTime desc

SELECT * FROM formpage
and pageRelease = ${PageRelease} and curStatus=2
order by recordTime desc
